title: Blood, Bone and Stone
description: A moving exploration of the nature of life and death and the enduring power of love. Set against the stunning backdrop of wild Orkney and mysterious Glastonbury, the story spans several millennia, from prehistory to the present day. Iona is an archaeologist who has buried herself in her work in an attempt to recover from her grief at the death of her adoptive mother. When the team uncovers the skeleton of a Bronze Age woman on the Orkney shore, she is about to discover the true nature of immortality. When we uncover the past, sometimes we discover ourselves.
author: Tara Barnacle
